client

Class ReportObserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • client.ReportObserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteObserver, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class ReportObserver
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteObserver
    The ReportObserver instance receives and applies reports' updates from the Watchneighbours server, with a ReportUpdater instance
    Author:
    Luca Landa
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReportObserver

        public ReportObserver(MainWindowController view)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Instance of ReportObserver keeps MainView's reports list up to date, applying updates received from Watchneighbourss server. This constructor automatically generates his own ID for the ReportObserver instance
        Parameters:
        view - the main view of client's application
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred

      • ReportObserver

        public ReportObserver(MainWindowController view,
                      java.lang.String id)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Instance of ReportObserver keeps MainView's reports list up to date, applying updates received from Watchneighbourss server.
        Parameters:
        view - the main view of client's application
        id - the id to assign to the instance
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if a connection issue occurred
